free: #e Today, Buya, you came to my home.
#c 今天, Buya, 你來我家。
#n azu mawtu=isu, qa-lizaq aiku: 如果你來,我會高興
#e You came to visit me, your sister.
#n lawut-an-ku qaqa-ku: 我拜訪我的哥哥/姊姊
#n m-lawut aiku tu qaqa-ku: 我拜訪我的哥哥/姊姊
#e It doesn’t matter. Later, we will eat dinner and we will drink, said I.
#c 沒關係.等會,我們一起吃晚餐,我們喝酒,我說
#e I haven’t come for a long time. I feel sorry too.
#c 我很久沒來,我也不好意思。
#n siRap qiRuziq-an-ku kelisiw-na, tangi m-siqaz=iku t<m>ayta timaizipana: ‘昨天我偷了他的錢,今天我不好意思見他’
#n qa-siqaz-an-ku: 我很不好意思的事
#n siRap m-suRaw=iku qa-siqaz-an waway-ku: ‘昨天,我跌倒,我的行為(讓人)不好意思’
#e We (lived) nearby, (but) I come here once in a while.
#c 我們(住的)近, (但)我很久才來一次。
#n nayau qawqa nengi: 那樣才好
#n qa-usiq=pama=iku matiw tayan q<m>an: 我才去那裡吃過一次
#e We do not visit (them), (and) it is bad for sisters.
#c 我們沒去拜訪, 對姊姊們不好。
#n zana baqian=ay Ribang zau: 那是老人家的東西
#e No matter where the relatives live, I would visit them even it’s far.
#c 親友不管在哪裡,很遠我也去拜訪。
#e We went to see our relatives, I told you.
#c 我們去看親戚,我這樣跟你講。
#e (If) you go, he has fish and he has wine.
#c 你去的話,他有魚他有酒。
#e (these) are to treat you to drinking wine.
#e We do not have free time.
#e It seems as if we did not know our elder, Tipil.
#c 好像我們裝做不知道我們的長輩, Tipil。
#e Not long ago, I went (there) once.
#e (these) are to treat you to drinking wine.
#e We do not have free time.
#e It seems as if we did not know our elder, Tipil.
#c 好像我們裝做不知道我們的長輩, Tipil。
#e Not long ago, I went (there) once.
#e They drank wine by the road.
#e We were there chatting with them and their friends.
#c 我們在哪裡跟他們還有他們的朋友聊天。
#e They have many friends, also including the sister-in-law, Panay, his (Tipil’s) wife.
#c 他們的朋友很多, 還包括姐姐Panay, 就是他的(Tipil的)太太。
#n yau qaya zaku=ay kelisiw: ‘我也有錢’
#n aiku pataqsian, ti-ulaw pataqsian qaya: ‘我是學生, Ulaw也是學生’
#e Tipil said to me, “If (you) have time, come (to visit me) again.”
#c Tipil跟我說,如果有時間的話,就再來喔。
#n matiw=iku tangi, amawaR qatiw=iku uman: ‘我今天去, 我明天還要去’
#n matiw=iku tangi, amawaR uman=iku qatiw: ‘我今天去, 我明天還要去’
